ygData.subject: Re: Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: Mistmoore is what I ve heard. Somone said they thought it came from the same person that dropped the Gypsy Princess Lute. Dunno. It will be a LONG tiem before
ygData.messageBody:
Mistmoore is what I've heard. Somone said they thought it came from the same
person that dropped the Gypsy Princess Lute. Dunno. It will be a LONG tiem
before I can either buy the drum or get it on my own.... *Sigh*

Lulen
Bard of the 10th Chorus
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Roop Dirump <roop@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 06:29
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Battle Drum


> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>
> :drools:
>
> Just where does one get the drum again...?
>
> Roop
>
>
> >From: Kaz <kokada@...-net.ne.jp>
> >
> >
> >On Thu, 1 Jul 1999 21:04:52 -0400
> >"Bosmun" <bosmun@...> wrote:
> >
> >> Has anyone tried using the battle drum on somthing like Guardian
Rhythms?
> >> Or any song where there is a direct measureable effect?
> >
> >Hail felow Bards,
> >It's first time for me to come to here .
> >
> >now im lvl38, when i tested Guardian Rhythms at lvl35 ,
> >*with Normal drum : 38 Resist up
> >*with Battle Drum : 47 Resist up
> >
> >a bit effective :) and FastRun is more faster, indeed.
> >
> >Kazuhisa at E'ci
